name: Buyai
description: BuyAI: Pay for Everything with Crypto. No KYC. Total Privacy. BuyAI lets you pay for 200+ top AI tools and subscriptions using crypto. No banks. No limits. No ID. You also get access to 3,000+ gift cards from major brands streaming, gaming, shopping all without KYC. Non-KYC eSIMs for global mobile data, and the BuyAI Privacy Mixer to send crypto anonymously. Privacy isn’t optional. With BuyAI, it’s built in.
